column5: Just steps from the bay, this darling vacation home is the perfect spot to unwind from the world. The upstairs sleeps six comfortably within its three bedrooms. Both bathrooms feature large walk in showers. The recently renovated kitchen features granite countertops and newer appliances. This vacation home also features two incredible decks to enjoy the fantastic Rockport weather. Although you may never use it, the living room does offer a 50 inch TV with basic cable.
